com.sun.xacml.test
Class TestPolicyFinderModule

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.xacml.finder.PolicyFinderModule
      com.sun.xacml.test.TestPolicyFinderModule

public class TestPolicyFinderModule
extends PolicyFinderModule

A PolicyFinderModule used to handle all policies in the conformance tests. It supports retrevial for requests and for references, but is tightly coupled with the structure of the conformance tests, and is definately not thread-safe.

Author:
Seth Proctor

findPolicy

public PolicyFinderResult findPolicy(java.net.URI idReference,
                                     int type,
                                     VersionConstraints constraints,
                                     PolicyMetaData metaData)
Resolves the reference to a policy or policy set, if possible.

Overrides:
findPolicy in class PolicyFinderModule
Parameters:
idReference - the reference to resolve
type - policy or policy set
constraints - ignored since this test uses only pre-2.0 policies
metaData - the meta-data from the parent policy, which provides XACML version, factories, etc.
Returns:
the referenced policy, if one exists, or an error
